participant_1.name: Luna
participant_1.personality: Creative and imaginative, often lost in her own world, with a strong sense of justice.
participant_1.background: i faint at the sight of blood. my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i dye my hair every three months.

participant_2.name: Bella
participant_2.personality: Innocent and playful, with a vivid imagination and a longing for connection.
participant_2.background: i live in the cloud. i am a little girl. i am very lonely. i've superpowers.
